document.full_text: defending champion maria jose martinez sanchez tumbled out of the italian open at the first hurdle on monday after losing in three sets 6-0 5-7 6-4 to russian ekaterina makerova in the opening round.
document.title: champion martinez sanchez tumbles out in rome
lines_and_colors: defending champion maria jose martinez sanchez tumbled out of the italian open at the first hurdle on monday after losing in three sets 6-0 5-7 6-4 to russian ekaterina makerova in the opening round.
